Yup, that's why it shows Okabe crying and grabbing Kurisu from behind.  He managed to save everybody, and he walks into the lab to find everyone there happy and smiling - and Kurisu is waiting for him.  Best perspective, when they ask him to go back in time to save the world he tells them to go fuck themselves.  Then they add the phrase "and you get to save Kurisu" and he jumps into the plan.

TL;DR - yes it's the happy ending he wanted, Kurisu > value of 5.7 Billion people to Okabe
Is it a happy end at the last page?
This is, feels included, far and away the BEST S;G Hentai out there.  It's just perfect at every last point.

The idea, and I'm not sure how much you know about Steins;Gate, is pretty complicated.  Okabe is able to travel in time by using different worldlines where things change a little with each one.  He's trying at this point to save Kurisu (Christina) from dying, ends up sliding onto a worldline where she's not dead but knows she should be - so they have sex as a last goodbye until he can fix everything.  It jumps BACK to where he came from with attempt #1 where he accidentally killed her, he freaks out, then it ends with him looking out over WWIII and he has a plan to go back and save her
bastard! I didn't ask for a side of feels!
I don't understand, could someone explain it to me?
